nodes.text: Zenezians were a sentient species. The musician Infrablue Zedbeddy Coggins was a Zenezian, as was Sudswater Dillifay Glon.

Zenezians first appeared in the 2015 film Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens, but were not identified until the 2019 audiobook Choose Your Destiny: A Maz's Castle Mission, written by Cavan Scott. The spelling of Zenezian was unconfirmed until Scott provided it via Twitter.
